product_name: Quiksilver Stand Up Paddleboard Inflatable PFD Belt Pack
long_description: The Quiksilver Stand Up Paddleboard Inflatable PFD belt pack lets you bring along on-demand flotation in a handy, easy-to-access belt. The Quiksilver Stand Up Padleboard Inflatable PFD belt pack inflates instantly with the simple tug of a cord, providing 29 lbs. of flotation should you need it. Belt pack fits around your waist, and inflated PFD is attached by a tether so it won't float away. After inflation, place the PFD over head and adjust for fit. Belt pack opens via a rip-and-stick pouch and features a zippered pocket, D-ring and clear window; tough nylon construction stands up to frequent use. Includes 33g CO2 cylinder with a 0.5 in. thread. Fits waist sizes 30 - 52 in.; Quiksilver recommends this PFD for users over 16 yrs. old.
short_description: The Quiksilver Stand Up Paddleboard Inflatable PFD belt pack lets you bring along on-demand flotation in a handy, easy-to-access belt.
